Verses: 1 usiyaavinudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yodhaamin Kumaaran Aagaas Ennum Yoodhaadhesaththu Raajaavin Naatkalile, Redhseen Ennum Seeriyaavin Raajaavum, Remaliyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Pekkaa Ennum Isravelin Raajaavum Erusaleminmel Yuththampanna Vandhaargal, Avargalaal Adhaip Pidikkak Koodaamarpoyitru.

2 seeriyar Eppiraayeemai Saarndhirukkiraargalendru Dhaaveedhin Kudumbaththukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Raajaavin Irudhayamum Avan Janaththin Irudhayamum Kaattilulla Marangal Kaatrinaal Asaigiradhupol Asaindhadhu.
3 appozhudhu Karththar Esaayaavai Nokki: Neeyum Un Magan Seyaaryaasoobumaaga Vannaar Thuraivazhiyilulla Merkulaththu Madhagin Kadaisimattum Aagaasukku Edhirkondupoi,
4 nee Avanai Nokki: Seeriyar Eppiraayeemodum, Remaliyaavin Maganodum Unakku Virodhamaaga Dhuraalosanai Panni,
5 naam Yoodhaavukku Virodhamaaippoi, Adhai Nerukki, Adhai Namakkulle Pangittukkondu, Adharkuth Thabeyaalin Kumaaranai Raajaavaaga Erpaduththuvom Endru Sonnadhinimiththam;
6 nee Bayappadaamal Amarndhirukkap Paar; Indha Irandu Pugaigira Kollikkattaigalaagiya Seeriyarode Vandha Redhseenum, Remaliyaavin Maganum Konda Ukkirakkobaththinimiththam Un Irudhayam Thuvalavendaam.
7 karththaraagiya Aandavar: Andha Aalosanai Nilainirpadhillai, Adhinpadi Sambavippadhumillai;
8 seeriyaavin Thalai Thamasku, Thamaskuvin Thalai Redhseen; Innum Arubaththaindhu Varushangalile Eppiraayeem Oru Janamaayiraadhapadikku Norungundupom.
9 eppiraayeemin Thalai Samaariyaa, Samaariyaavin Thalai Remaliyaavin Magan; Neengal Visuvaasiyaavittaal Nilaiperamaatteergal Endru Sol Endraar.
10 pinnum Karththar Aagaasai Nokki:
11 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Oru Adaiyaalaththai Vendikkol; Adhai Aazhaththilirundhaagilum, Unnadhaththilirundhaagilum Undaagak Kettukkol Endru Sonnaar.
12 aagaaso: Naan Ketkamaatten, Naan Karththaraip Pareetchaiseyyamaatten Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Esaayaa: Dhaaveedhin Vamsaththaare, Kelungal; Neengal Manusharai Visanappaduththugiradhu Podhaadhendru En Dhevanaiyum Visanappaduththap Paarkkireergalo?
14 aadhalaal Aandavar Thaame Ungalukku Oru Adaiyaalaththaik Koduppaar; Idho, Oru Kannigai Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaal, Avarukku Immaanuvel Endru Periduvaal.
15 theemaiyai Veruththu Nanmaiyaith Therindhukolla Ariyum Vayadhumattum Avar Venneyaiyum Thenaiyum Saappiduvaar.
16 andhap Pillai Theemaiyai Verukkavum, Nanmaiyaith Therindhukollavum Arigiradharkumunne, Nee Aruvarukkira Dhesam Adhin Irandu Raajaakkalaal Vittuvidappadum.
17 eppiraayeem Yoodhaavaivittup Pirindha Naalmudhal Varaadha Naatkalaik Karththar Unmelum, Un Janaththinmelum, Un Pidhaavudaiya Vamsaththinmelum, Aseeriyaavin Raajaavinaale Varappannuvaar.
18 annaatkalile, Karththar Egipthu Nadhigalin Kadaiyaandharaththilulla Eeyaiyum, Aseeriyaa Dhesaththilirukkum Theneeyaiyum Payilkaatti Azhaippaar.
19 avaigal Vandhu Egamaai Vanaandharangalin Pallaththaakkugalilum, Kanmalaigalin Vedippugalilum, Ellaa Mutkaadugalilum, Meychchalulla Ellaa Idangalilum Thangum.

20 akkaalaththile Aandavar Koolikkuvaangina Savaragan Kaththiyinaal, Adhaavadhu, Nadhiyin Akkaraiyilulla Aseeriyaa Raajaavinaal Thalaimayiraiyum Kaalmayiraiyum Siraippiththu Thaadiyaiyum Vaangippoduvippaar.
21 akkaalaththil Oruvan Oru Ilampasuvaiyum, Irandu Aadugalaiyum Valarththaal,
22 avaigal Pooranamaaip Paalkarakkirapadiyinaal Venneyai Saappiduvaan; Dhesaththin Naduvil Meedhiyaayiruppavanevanum Venneyaiyum Thenaiyume Saappiduvaan.
23 annaalile, Aayiram Vellikkaasu Perum Aayiram Dhraatchachchediyirundha Nilamellaam Mutchediyum Nerinjilumaagum.
24 dhesamengum Mutchediyum Nerinjilum Undaayiruppadhinaal, Ambugalaiyum Villaiyum Pidiththu Ange Pogavendiyadhaayirukkum.

25 manvettiyaal Koththappadugira Malaigal Unde; Mutchedigalukkum Nerinjilgalukkum Bayappaduvadhinaal Avaigalil Ondrirkum Pogak Koodaamaiyinaal, Avaigal Maadugalai Ottividuvadharkum, Aadugal Midhippadharkumaana Idamaayirukkum Endraan.
